Lovepop | Boston, MA | ONSITE

Through breath-taking 3D popup cards, our goal is to encourage all of us to tangibly acknowledge and surprise important people in our lives way more often.

We're building out a development team to make customizing and sending Lovepop's as simple and elegant as the cards we create.

We are looking for engineer's who are excited to figure out and build incredible experiences from scratch (literally...zero legacy code) in a super collaborative, agile product team. Currently have open roles for a tech lead, full stack and Front end engineering.

I'm the head of product. Feel free to reach out to me: max@lovepopcards.com for more info.
